target.query: involvedObject.labels.name:"$service" AND involvedObject.namespace:$namespace AND type:Warning AND message:"probe failed" AND NOT message:"Startup probe failed"
involvedObject.kind:"HorizontalPodAutoscaler" AND involvedObject.namespace:$namespace AND involvedObject.name:"$service" AND NOT message:"All metrics below target"
involvedObject.kind:"HorizontalPodAutoscaler" AND involvedObject.namespace:$namespace AND involvedObject.name:"$service" AND message:"below"

list.expr: {service_name="unknown_service"} | logfmt | namespace = `$namespace` |~ `(?i)probe failed` | type=`Warning` | name=~`$service.*` | msg!~`Startup probe failed.*`
list.name: Probe failures

targets.expr:
label_replace(
    max (target_info{job="$service", environment="$namespace"}) by (k8s_pod_name, container_image_tag),
    "service_instance_id", "$1", "k8s_pod_name", "(.*)"
)

or 

label_replace(
    max (jvm_info{service="$service", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod), 
    "service_instance_id", "$1", "pod", "(.+)"
)

sum by(service_instance_id) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{job="$service", jvm_memory_type="heap", environment="$namespace"})*100/sum by(service_instance_id) (jvm_memory_max_bytes{job="$service", jvm_memory_type="heap", environment="$namespace"})

or 

label_replace(
    sum by(pod) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{service="$service", area="heap", namespace="$namespace"})*100/sum by(pod) (jvm_memory_max_bytes{service="$service", area="heap", namespace="$namespace"}),
    "service_instance_id", "$1", "pod", "(.+)"
)

sum by(service_instance_id) (increase(http_server_request_duration_sum{service_name="$service", environment="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(service_instance_id) (increase(http_server_request_duration_count{service_name="$service", environment="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))

or 

label_replace(
    sum by(pod) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{service="$service", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(pod) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{service="$service", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])),
    "service_instance_id", "$1", "pod", "(.+)"
)

sum by(service_instance_id) (60 * rate(http_server_request_duration_count{service_name="$service", environment="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))

 or 

label_replace(
    sum by(pod) (60 * rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{service="$service", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])),
    "service_instance_id", "$1", "pod", "(.+)"
)

time() - (label_replace(
    max (process_start_time_seconds{job="$service", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod),
    "service_instance_id", "$1", "pod", "(.+)"
)

or

max (process_start_time_seconds{service_name="$service", environment="$namespace"}) by (service_instance_id)
)

panels.description: Total number of TicketDispatchNotificationEvent messages published to SNS across all instances since service start
panels.title: Total Events Published

panels.description: Percentage of successfully processed events vs consumed events across all instances
panels.title: Success Rate

panels.description: Total number of TicketDispatchNotificationEvent messages published to SNS across all instances since service start
panels.title: Total Events Published
SQS Events Consuming and Processing Monitoring

panels.description: Distribution of HTTP client response times by service over time across all instances
panels.title: HTTP Client Duration by Service

targets.expr:
avg(sum by(service_instance_id) (jvm_memory_used{environment="$namespace", service_name="$service", jvm_memory_type="heap"}))

or 

avg(sum by(pod) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{namespace="$namespace", service="$service", area="heap"}))

sum by(service_instance_id) (jvm_memory_used{environment="$namespace", service_name="$service", jvm_memory_type="heap"})

or 

sum by(pod) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{namespace="$namespace", service="$service", area="heap"})

avg(sum by(service_instance_id) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{environent="$namespace", service_name="$service", jvm_memory_type="non_heap"}))

or 

avg(sum by(pod) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{namespace="$namespace", service="$service", area="nonheap"}))

sum by(service_instance_id) (jvm_memory_used{environment="$namespace", service_name="$service", jvm_memory_type="non_heap"})

or 

sum by(pod) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{namespace="$namespace", service="$service", area="nonheap"})

max by(service_instance_id) (increase(jvm_gc_duration_sum{environment="$namespace", service_name="$service", jvm_gc_name="G1 Young Generation"}[1m]))

or 

max by(pod) (increase(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service="$service", action="end of minor GC"}[1m]))

max by(service_instance_id) (increase(jvm_gc_duration_sum{environment="$namespace", service_name="$service", jvm_gc_name="G1 Old Generation"}[1m]))

or 

max by(pod) (increase(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service="$service", action="end of major GC"}[1m]))

label_replace(
  max(kube_horizontalpodautoscaler_spec_target_metric{horizontalpodautoscaler="$service",namespace="$namespace",metric_name="$hpa_metric_name", metric_target_type="utilization"}) by (metric_name, metric_target_type),
  "metric_unit", 
  "Percent (0-100)", 
  "metric_target_type", 
  ".*"
) or label_replace(
  max(kube_horizontalpodautoscaler_spec_target_metric{horizontalpodautoscaler="$service",namespace="$namespace",metric_name="$hpa_metric_name", metric_target_type!="utilization"}) by (metric_name, metric_target_type),
  "metric_unit", 
  "Number", 
  "metric_target_type", 
  ".+"
)

avg (sum by(service_instance_id) (increase(http_server_request_duration_count{service_name="$service", environment='$namespace'}[1m])))

or 

avg (sum by(pod) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{service="$service", env='$namespace'}[1m])))

sum by (uri)(
    label_replace(
        increase(
            http_server_request_duration_count{service_name="$service", environment="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
        "uri", "$1", "http_route", "(.+)"
    )
)

or 

sum by (uri) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{service="$service"}[1m]))

sum by (pod)(
    label_replace(
        increase(
            http_server_request_duration_sum{service_name="$service", environment="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
        "pod", "$1", "service_instance_id", "(.+)"
    )
)

/ sum by (pod)(
    label_replace(
        increase(
            http_server_request_duration_count{service_name="$service", environment="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
        "pod", "$1", "service_instance_id", "(.+)"
    )
)

or 

sum by(pod) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{service="$service"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(pod) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{service="$service"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (uri)(
    label_replace(
        increase(
            http_server_request_duration_sum{service_name="$service", environment="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
        "uri", "$1", "http_route", "(.+)"
    )
)

/ sum by (uri)(
    label_replace(
        increase(
            http_server_request_duration_count{service_name="$service", environment="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
        "uri", "$1", "http_route", "(.+)"
    )
)

or 

sum by (uri)(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{service="$service"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (uri) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{service="$service"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (status)(
    label_replace(
        increase(
            http_server_request_duration_count{service_name="$service", environment="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
        "status", "$1", "http_response_status_code", "(.+)"
    )
)

or 

sum by (status)(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{service="$service"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by ( server) (
    rate(
      traces_service_graph_request_client_seconds_sum{client="$service", clien_environment="$namespace"}              
      [$__rate_interval]) / rate (traces_service_graph_request_client_seconds_count{client="$service", client_environment="$namespace"}               
      [$__rate_interval]
    )
)

sum by(server_address) (increase(http_client_request_duration_count{service_name="$service", environment="$namespace"}[1m]))

or 

sum by(client_name) (increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{service="$service", namespace="$namespace"}[1m]))

sum by(error_type, server_address) (increase(http_client_request_duration_count{service_name="$service", http_response_status_code!~"1.*|2.*|3.*", environment="$namespace"}[1m]))

or 

sum by(status, client_name) (increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{service="$service", outcome!="SUCCESS", namespace="$namespace"}[1m]))

list.definition: query_result(count (    process_start_time_seconds{environment="$namespace"} or    jvm_class_count{environment="$namespace"} or    label_replace (        process_start_time_seconds{namespace="$namespace"}        , "service_name", "$1", "service", "(.+)"    )) by (service_name))
list.label: Service
list.name: service

query.query: query_result(count (    process_start_time_seconds{environment="$namespace"} or    jvm_class_count{environment="$namespace"} or    label_replace (        process_start_time_seconds{namespace="$namespace"}        , "service_name", "$1", "service", "(.+)"    )) by (service_name))

list.definition: query_result(max (    jvm_info{namespace="$namespace", service="$service"}     or     label_replace(target_info{environment="$namespace", job="$service"}, "container", "$1", "k8s_container_name", "(.+)")    or     process_start_time_seconds{namespace="$namespace", service="$service"}) by (container))
list.label: Container
list.name: container

query.query: query_result(max (    jvm_info{namespace="$namespace", service="$service"}     or     label_replace(target_info{environment="$namespace", job="$service"}, "container", "$1", "k8s_container_name", "(.+)")    or     process_start_time_seconds{namespace="$namespace", service="$service"}) by (container))

list.definition: query_result(label_replace(    max (target_info{job="$service", environment="$namespace"}) by (k8s_pod_name, container_image_tag),    "service_instance_id", "$1", "k8s_pod_name", "(.*)")or label_replace(    max (jvm_info{service="$service", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod),     "service_instance_id", "$1", "pod", "(.+)")or label_replace( max(jvm_memory_max_bytes{service="$service", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod), "service_instance_id", "$1", "pod", "(.+)"))
list.label: Pods
list.name: pods

query.query: query_result(label_replace(    max (target_info{job="$service", environment="$namespace"}) by (k8s_pod_name, container_image_tag),    "service_instance_id", "$1", "k8s_pod_name", "(.*)")or label_replace(    max (jvm_info{service="$service", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod),     "service_instance_id", "$1", "pod", "(.+)")or label_replace( max(jvm_memory_max_bytes{service="$service", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod), "service_instance_id", "$1", "pod", "(.+)"))
